name: æè€å¸ˆä¸æ˜¯ä½ è€å¸ˆ
content:
After eleven months, I have reached a new stage.
Thanks to all my friends who follow what is happening in China through me.
Thanks to all the contributors for their trust.
I hope this account can go further, and I hope the Chinese Twitter community can get better and better.
I would like to end with the words I said when my Weibo account was blocked last year: You will never be able to defeat me in the matter of freedom of speech.
Love you all

Netizen contribution
Some netizens found that the topic of nucleic acid testing (note that it is a topic) can no longer be searched on Weibo.
At the same time, some netizens found that their nucleic acid test records could not be found either.

On March 4, the owners of Hanzhong Zhongbin No. 1 Community collectively defended their rights and demanded to move out of their homes

name: æè€å¸ˆä¸æ˜¯ä½ è€å¸ˆ
content: Dai Bin, a member of the National Committee of the Chinese People's Political Consultative Conference, said that the number of domestic tourists during the Spring Festival reached 308 million, indicating that the value of Chinese passports is increasing.

name: æè€å¸ˆä¸æ˜¯ä½ è€å¸ˆ
content:
Netizen contribution
Recently, it was reported online that a student at ShanghaiTech University violently killed dozens of cats on campus, and it was suspected that toxic chemical reagents of unknown origin were used in the process.
At present, the teachers and students of ShanghaiTech University have collectively petitioned to expel the girl involved in order to maintain campus safety, but the school did not respond to the growing public opinion, and at the same time helped the girl involved to approve her suspension procedures at the speed of light on the grounds of so-called "personal safety".

name: æè€å¸ˆä¸æ˜¯ä½ è€å¸ˆ
content:
Netizen contribution
Recently, it was reported online that a female student at NIO was raped by a male colleague during her probation period. Although the man was sentenced to ten months in prison after reporting the case to the police, the girl did not pass the probation period. NIO HR said that she was "risky" and "would affect the company's image."

name: æè€å¸ˆä¸æ˜¯ä½ è€å¸ˆ
content:
Netizen contribution
According to the Yangtze River News of Hubei Radio and Television Station, on March 2, the first batch of personal data related to the epidemic in Wuxi was successfully destroyed, with 1 billion pieces of data destroyed.

name: æè€å¸ˆä¸æ˜¯ä½ è€å¸ˆ
content: On March 1, it was reported online that at the 100-day sprint oath-taking ceremony for the high school entrance exam at Bailong Middle School in Jiange County, Guangyuan City, Sichuan Province, the school organized students to kneel and kowtow to their parents. After the video was exposed, some netizens questioned it and said that guilt-based education should be rejected. On the 4th, the county education bureau responded that it had received feedback from parents and was currently investigating.

The result caused ridicule in the comment section
